page-not-found.title: Sorry, page not found!
page-not-found.subtitle: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for. Perhaps you’ve mistyped the URL? Be sure to check your spelling.

four.title: Various packages suitable for every lifestyle
four.subtitle: Choose to suit you.
four.q-and-a-title: คำถามที่พบบ่อย
four.q-1: เช็กยอดเงินและวันคงเหลือ?
four.a-1: กด *4111# แล้วกดโทรออก
four.q-2: เช็กอัตราค่าบริการ?
four.a-2: กด *4112# แล้วกดโทรออก
four.q-3: เช็กแพ็กเกจเสริมปัจจุบัน?
four.a-3: กด *4113# แล้วกดโทรออก

five.title: Download the Feels Dealer SIM app
five.detail: Make your user experience easy. Top up, apply for additional packages, register for a SIM, all in one app.

step1.title: Top Up
step1.subtitle: Select the amount you want to top up.
step1.phone-label: Specify the phone number you want to top up.
step1.phone-format: Please enter your phone number correctly.
step1.top-up-amount-label: Specify the amount you want to top up.
step1.remark-1: Please check your details before pressing the payment button.
step1.remark-2: The amount of money in the SIM is for use only. Cannot be used to purchase packages.
step1.top-up-amount-require: Please select the amount you want to top up.
step1.not-available-phone-number: This phone number is not available for transactions.
step1.cannot-get-phone-number: Unable to retrieve phone number information.

step2.qr-code-detail-1: Scan or Upload QR Code via your mobile banking app. Code will be valid for 1 day
step2.qr-code-detail-2: If you choose to pay via QR Code, Please wait for the message confirming the transaction again via SMS.

result.title: Pay with QR Code via Mobile Banking
result.info: Please complete the transaction within 1 day

step2.qr-code-detail-1: Scan or Upload QR Code via your mobile banking app. Code will be valid for 1 day
step2.qr-code-detail-2: If you choose to pay via QR Code, Please wait for the message confirming the transaction again via SMS.
step2.sim-balance-detail-1: The system will deduct the remaining balance within the SIM for this item. Please wait and do not turn off the screen until the transaction is displayed again.
step2.sim-balance-detail-2: If the transaction is successful, there will be a message confirming the transaction again.
step2.phone-number-label: Phone number to purchase extra package
step2.not-available-phone-number: This phone number is not available for transactions.
step2.cannot-get-phone-number: Unable to retrieve phone number information.
step2.order-type-not-support: Top up type not support with this payment method

qr-code.title: Pay with QR Code via Mobile Banking
qr-code.info: Please complete the transaction within 1 day

sim-balance.title: Pay through the remaining balance within the SIM.
sim-balance.detail: Please wait for the message confirming your application for the extra package again.
